xdsa5r.maxDiceCount.name: Number of dice bonuses displayed in the dice window.
xdsa5r.maxDiceCount.hint: The highest number of bonuses displayed in the popup. Value range [1-10].
xdsa5r.enableLowLeP.name: Enable for reduced LeP regeneration.
xdsa5r.enableLowLeP.hint: If you play with 1W3 for regeneration, then enable here.
xdsa5r.enableLeP.name: Hide LeP dice line
xdsa5r.enableLeP.hint: Hide the line for LeP in the cube window.
xdsa5r.enableAsP.name: Hide AsP cube row
xdsa5r.enableAsP.hint: Hides the line for AsP in the cube window
xdsa5r.enableKaP.name: Hide KaP cube row
xdsa5r.enableKaP.hint: Hides the line for KaP in the cube window.
xdsa5r.enable1W20.name: Hide 1W20 dice
xdsa5r.enable1W20.hint: Hides the line for the 1W20 in the dice window.
xdsa5r.enable1W6.name: Hide 1W6 dice
xdsa5r.enable1W6.hint: Hides the line for the 1W6 in the dice window.
xdsa5r.enable2W6.name: Hide 2W6 dice
xdsa5r.enable2W6.hint: Hides the line for the 2W6 in the dice window.
xdsa5r.enable3W6.name: Hide 3W6 dice
xdsa5r.enable3W6.hint: Hides the line for the 3W6 in the dice window.
xdsa5r.enableCoinflip.name: Hide coin flip
xdsa5r.enableCoinflip.hint: Hides the line for the coin flip in the dice window.
